detaileddescription.para: This example shows how to stream an Ogg Opus file to a voice channel. This example requires some additional dependencies, namely libogg and opusfile.
You can compile this example using the following command

sect2.title: Using liboggz
sect2.para: You can use liboggz to stream an Ogg Opus file to discord voice channel. liboggz provides higher level abstraction and useful APIs. Some features liboggz provides include: seeking and timestamp interpretation. Read more on the documentation.
You can compile this example using the following command:
